column3: Closing as there is still discussions as to how to proceeed

Could be cool to seize the opportunity to remove the `<b>` tag from tr() call.\nSee [this](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/qt/sendcoinsdialog.cpp#L281) or [this](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/qt/sendcoinsdialog.cpp#L356) for some examples.\n(unless somebody knows of a good reason style tags should be kept for translators but I don't think that's the case)
